title: The End of an Era: Migrating from WordPress to Gatsby

recommendations.comment: After four years, I've finally migrated from @WordPress to @gatsbyjs. Now my site lives in a #NodeJS and #React environment and is hosted on @Netlify, and all my posts exist as beautiful markdown. I'm loving it.
Interesting point of view regarding the Gatsby approach. The End of an Era: Migrating from WordPress to Gatsby
Tania Rascia shares her experiences on moving off WordPress and into Gatsby, great read :D
